lead_paragraph: Rosalind Russell recreates her hallmark stage role as the eccentric grand dame of highlife, bringing up a 10-year-old nephew. A banquet of laughter, nominated for 6 Academy Awards.
snippet: Rosalind Russell recreates her hallmark stage role as the eccentric grand dame of highlife, bringing up a 10-year-old nephew. A banquet of laughter, nominated for 6 Academy Awards.
